sentence.Network_en: You know I have no intention of being awkward and obstreperous.
sentence.Network_cn: 你知道我无意存心作对。

sentence.Network_en: He becomes obstreperous when he's had a few drinks.
sentence.Network_cn: 他喝了些酒就爱撒酒疯.

sentence.Network_en: Giles Gosling himself was somewhat scandalized at the obstreperous nature of their mirth.
sentence.Network_cn: 吉尔斯·戈斯林本人看到大家高兴起来那么喧哗,有点难为情.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语反义词 - 豆丁网 ... oblique 倾斜的>笔直的 obstreperous 吵闹的, 暴乱的>遵守纪律的 obstructed 阻碍的>不阻塞的.

《GMAT600分词汇》第三课 ... obsidian n.黑曜石 obstreperous a.喧闹的；不守秩序的 obtuse a.钝的；迟钝的.

list.abs: obstreperous behaviour , children ., 难以管束的行为 , 儿童.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (in the sense 'clamorous, vociferous'): from Latin obstreperus (from obstrepere, from ob- 'against' + strepere 'make a noise') + -ous

entry.tran: 吵闹的；喧闹的；难以管束的;桀骜不驯的
entry.def: If you say that someone is obstreperous, you think that they are noisy and difficult to control.

example.ex: You know I have no intention of being awkward and obstreperous.
example.tran: 你知道我无意存心作对。

auth_sentence.content: He can appeal not only to the party main stream but to its obstreperous minority.
auth_sentence.res_content: He can appeal not only to the party main stream but to its obstreperous minority.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He can appeal not only to the party main stream but to its obstreperous minority.

auth_sentence.content: The obstreperous foreign merchants invoke the principles of free trade to justify opium exports to China.
auth_sentence.res_content: The obstreperous foreign merchants invoke the principles of free trade to justify opium exports to China.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The obstreperous foreign merchants invoke the principles of free trade to justify opium exports to China.
